title: Tuesday Things.

author: Jessica
excerpt: 1. It’s almost tomato toast time. Think sourdough, very slight smear of mayo, cheddar slice, tomato slice, flaked salt. Ah. I can taste it. 2. Double blueberry pancakes. I must make these for my kids! 3. I really want to be fun and get an outdoor projector to watch movies. But… I hate bugs. I […]
text: 1. It’s almost tomato toast time. Think sourdough, very slight smear of mayo, cheddar slice, tomato slice, flaked salt. Ah. I can taste it. 2. Double blueberry pancakes. I must make these for my kids! 3. I really want to be fun and get an outdoor projector to watch movies. But… I hate bugs. I am an indoor cat. 4. The ultimate productivity hack is saying no. YEP. 5. TV things!! The Waterfront! I mean, I don’t know if I am obsessed yet, but anyone who created Dawson’s Creek… I’m there. Should I watch Love Island? I never have. 6. Car tiramisu. I cannot. 7. Pretty sure my addiction to my kindle is out of control. Can you read too much?! 8. Another thing we’re all addicted to in this house: Trader Joe’s patio potato chips. WHY are they so good?! I usually don’t even care about chips. 9. 3 habits of people who get things done!
html:
1. It’s almost tomato toast time. Think sourdough, very slight smear of mayo, cheddar slice, tomato slice, flaked salt. Ah. I can taste it.

2. Double blueberry pancakes. I must make these for my kids!

3. I really want to be fun and get an outdoor projector to watch movies. But… I hate bugs. I am an indoor cat.

4. The ultimate productivity hack is saying no. YEP.

5. TV things!! The Waterfront! I mean, I don’t know if I am obsessed yet, but anyone who created Dawson’s Creek… I’m there. Should I watch Love Island? I never have.

6. Car tiramisu. I cannot.

7. Pretty sure my addiction to my kindle is out of control. Can you read too much?!

8. Another thing we’re all addicted to in this house: Trader Joe’s patio potato chips. WHY are they so good?! I usually don’t even care about chips.

9. 3 habits of people who get things done!
